title: Privacy Policy | GoAccel
text: Privacy Policy (GoAccel) Effective Date: January 26, 2026 GoAccel (“GoAccel,” “we,” “us,” or “our”) values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard information when you visit our websites, create an account, or use our products and services (collectively, the “Services”). By using the Services, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy. 1) Information We Collect We collect information in the following ways: A. Information you provide Account and contact info: name, business name, email, phone number, address, job title Credentials: username/password or other authentication details Billing details: subscription information and payment-related data (payment processing is handled by third-party processors; we generally do not store full card numbers) Support and communications: messages, emails, chat transcripts, call notes, and other communications with us Customer Data and content: information and content you upload, import, or create in the Services (e.g., contacts, notes, tasks, files, messages, campaign content) B. Information collected automatically Device and usage data: IP address, browser type, device identifiers, pages viewed, actions taken, timestamps, referring URLs Log and diagnostic data: error logs and performance data Cookies and similar technologies: see Section 6 C. Information from third parties Integrations you connect: data shared from third-party services you authorize (e.g., calendars, email providers, CRM integrations) Service providers/partners: analytics, hosting, payment, and communications vendors Enrichment or data providers (if enabled): data returned by third-party data sources based on your configuration and permissions 2) How We Use Information We use information to: Provide, maintain, and improve the Services Create and manage accounts and authenticate users Process subscriptions, billing, and payments Provide support, troubleshooting, and customer service Send service-related messages (security alerts, confirmations, updates) Monitor and help prevent fraud, abuse, and security incidents Measure usage and improve performance and user experience Market our Services (where permitted; you can opt out of marketing emails) 3) Messaging, Communications, and Compliance Logging Some features may enable communications such as email and SMS/text messaging (“Messaging”). To operate these features, we may process and store Messaging-related data , such as: Sender and recipient information you provide Message content you create or send through the Services Delivery status, timestamps, opt-out events (e.g., STOP), and related metadata Compliance and audit logs where reasonably necessary We may use this information to provide Messaging features, help troubleshoot delivery issues, maintain suppression/opt-out lists, enforce our Terms, and comply with legal or provider requirements. 4) How We Share Information We may share information: With service providers that help us operate the Services (hosting, analytics, payment processing, messaging, customer support) With integrations you choose to connect (at your direction) For legal and safety reasons (to comply with law, respond to lawful requests, protect rights, prevent fraud/abuse, and protect users) During business transfers (merger, acquisition, financing, asset sale) With your consent or at your instruction We do not sell your personal information in the ordinary sense of the word. If a law defines “sale” broadly, you may have opt-out rights as described below. 5) Data Retention We retain information as long as necessary to provide the Services and for legitimate business purposes, including security, compliance, dispute resolution, and enforcement of agreements. Retention periods vary based on the data type and purpose. 6) Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar technologies to: Operate and secure the Services Remember preferences and sessions Analyze traffic and usage Improve marketing performance You can control cookies via browser settings. Disabling cookies may limit certain features. 7) Security We use commercially reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards designed to protect information. No method of transmission or storage is completely secure; we cannot guarantee absolute security. 8) Your Rights and Choices Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or receive a copy of your personal information, and to object to or restrict certain processing. You can also opt out of marketing emails using the unsubscribe link or by contacting us. 9) Children’s Privacy The Services are not intended for children under 13 (or under 16 in certain jurisdictions). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. 10) International Transfers If you access the Services from outside the United States, your information may be processed in the United States or other locations where we or our providers operate. 11) Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The Effective Date indicates the most recent update. Material changes may be communicated through the Services or other reasonable means. 12) Contact Us GoAccel Email: info@goaccel.ai Phone: 855.915.0747

title: GDPR | GoAccel
text: GDPR Notice (EU/UK) Effective Date: January 26, 2026 This GDPR Notice applies to individuals located in the European Economic Area (EEA), the United Kingdom, and Switzerland (“Europe”). It supplements the GoAccel Privacy Policy. 1) Roles: Controller vs. Processor For website visitors, prospects, and business contacts, GoAccel is generally the data controller of personal data we collect directly. For customer content and contact lists uploaded into the platform (“Customer Data”), you (our customer) typically act as the controller , and GoAccel acts as a processor processing Customer Data on your instructions, depending on how you use the Services. 2) Legal Bases for Processing We process personal data under one or more legal bases: Contract: to provide the Services, manage your account, and deliver requested functionality Legitimate interests: to secure, operate, improve, and market our Services, prevent fraud/abuse, and maintain performance (balanced against your rights) Consent: where required (e.g., certain cookies or marketing in some jurisdictions) Legal obligation: to comply with applicable law and lawful requests 3) Messaging Features and Related Data If Messaging features (such as email or SMS) are enabled, we may process message content and related metadata to provide the feature, maintain opt-out/suppression handling, troubleshoot delivery, and comply with provider/legal requirements. When GoAccel processes Customer Data for Messaging at your direction, you remain responsible for the lawful basis to contact recipients and for providing required notices and consents. 4) Your GDPR Rights You may have the right to: Access your personal data Correct inaccurate data Request deletion Restrict processing Object to processing (including direct marketing) Data portability Withdraw consent at any time (where processing is based on consent) Lodge a complaint with your supervisory authority To exercise rights, contact info@goaccel.ai . 5) International Transfers Your data may be transferred outside Europe, including to the United States. Where required, we use appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses or equivalent mechanisms. 6) Subprocessors We may use vetted subprocessors (e.g., hosting, analytics, communications, payment processors) to help deliver the Services. Subprocessors are required to protect data and process it consistent with our instructions and applicable law. 7) Retention We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes described, unless a longer period is required or permitted by law. 8) Contact GoAccel Email: info@goaccel.ai Phone: 855.915.0747

title: Sell My Business > Get The Blueprint | GoAccel
text: Sell Your Home Services Business for Maximum Value Get the Tools, Knowledge & Support Necessary to Build and Sell Your Business for Top Dollar Our proven process is built specifically for home services and skilled trade businesses – helping owners position their company correctly, reduce owner-dependency, and attract serious, qualified buyers. We’ll help you understand what your home services business is really worth, what buyers in this industry look for. Your Business Has Value Most home services and skilled trade businesses are built the hard way – decades of long days, a reputation earned job by job, and customers who trust you .. The problem is that many owners never realize what they’ve actually built. After working with contractors, tradespeople, and family-owned service companies for over 25 years, we have seen the same pattern repeat itself again and again : the owner retires, slows down, or steps away – and the business quietly retires with them. Not because it wasn’t successful, but because it was never systemized, documented, or positioned as something that could be sold. This is heartbreaking to witness. Don't Settle - Get Maximum Value The truth is, many of these businesses had real value. Predictable revenue. Loyal customers. Strong local brands. What they lacked wasn’t hard work – it was structure. Without systems, automation, and clear operational processes, buyers don’t see a transferable asset – they see a job that only works if the owner stays involved. GoAccel exists to change that outcome. We help home services and trade business owners build companies that operate independently, scale predictably, and can be positioned for a legitimate exit. Whether you plan to sell in two years or ten, the decisions you make now determine whether your business becomes a retirement plan – or a missed opportunity. Allow us to show you the exact blueprint for making this a reality for you while creating the wealth that you deserve.

title: Home & Commercial Services | GoAccel
text: Home & Commercial Services GoAccel is built specifically for home services and skilled trade businesses – companies that win or lose based on speed-to-lead, local visibility, and operational follow-through. Whether you run HVAC, plumbing, roofing, electrical, pest control, landscaping, concrete, cleaning, or another trade, the growth challenges are usually the same: inconsistent leads, missed calls, weak follow-up, slow estimates, and marketing that doesn’t translate into booked jobs. Our system fixes that by combining proven customer acquisition with a CRM platform designed to convert and retain customers.
